parts.text: {"word":"searching","priority":"★★☆","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"verb (present participle)","definition":"探している、検索している","english_definition":"looking for something; trying to find something.","examples":[{"sentence":"I'm searching for my keys.","translation":"鍵を探しています。"},{"sentence":"She was searching the internet for information.","translation":"彼女はインターネットで情報を検索していました。"},{"sentence":"The police are searching the area for the missing child.","translation":"警察は行方不明の子供のためにその地域を捜索しています。"}],"collocations":["searching for clues (手がかりを探す)","searching the house (家を捜索する)","searching online (オンラインで検索する)","searching through documents (書類を調べている)"],"synonyms":["looking for","seeking","hunting for","exploring","investigating"],"antonyms":["finding","discovering"]},{"part_of_speech":"adjective","definition":"（目つき・質問などが）探求的な、詮索好きな、洞察力のある","english_definition":"(of a look, question, etc.) looking or seeming to look very closely at someone or something, especially in a way that shows you are trying to discover something.","examples":[{"sentence":"She gave him a searching look.","translation":"彼女は彼を詮索するように見た。"},{"sentence":"He asked a searching question.","translation":"彼は探求的な質問をした。"},{"sentence":"The detective had a searching gaze.","translation":"刑事は洞察力のある視線をしていた。"}],"collocations":["searching gaze (探求的な視線)","searching questions (探求的な質問)","searching eyes (詮索好きな目)","searching look (詮索好きな視線)"],"synonyms":["probing","inquisitive","scrutinizing","penetrating","insightful"],"antonyms":["superficial","shallow","cursory"]},{"part_of_speech":"noun","definition":"捜索、検索","english_definition":"the act of looking carefully for something.","examples":[{"sentence":"The searching of the house took several hours.","translation":"家の捜索には数時間かかった。"},{"sentence":"The police conducted a thorough searching of the area.","translation":"警察はその地域を徹底的に捜索した。"}],"collocations":["a thorough searching (徹底的な捜索)","a body searching (身体検査)","a house searching (家宅捜索)"],"synonyms":["search","hunt","quest","exploration","investigation"],"antonyms":[]}],"etymology":{"value":"「search」の現在分詞形。","priority":"★☆☆"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/ˈsɜːrtʃɪŋ/","syllables":"search-ing"},"inflection":{"notes":"動詞 search の現在分詞/動名詞、形容詞"},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"「**searching**」は動詞「search」の現在分詞形で、文字通り何かを探している状態を表します。形容詞としては、単に「探している」という意味だけでなく、相手の心を見透かそうとするような、鋭い視線や質問を表すことがあります。名詞としては、捜索という行為そのものを指します。文脈によって意味が異なるため注意が必要です。","priority":"★★☆"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"✗ I am searching to my keys.","correct":"✓ I am searching for my keys.","note":"「～を探す」は "search for" という句動詞を使うため、前置詞 "for" が必要です。"},{"incorrect":"✗ He gave me a search look.","correct":"✓ He gave me a searching look.","note":"形容詞として「探求的な」という意味で使う場合は、"searching" を使います。名詞の "search" はここでは不適切です。"}],"priority":"★★☆"},"related_words":{"derivatives":["search (動詞/名詞: 探す、捜索)","searcher (名詞: 捜索者)","searchingly (副詞: 探求的に)"],"phrasal_verbs":["search out (探し出す)","search through (～をくまなく探す)"],"priority":"★★☆"},"level_frequency":{"CEFR":"B1","frequency_google_ngram":"比較的高頻度","priority":"★☆☆"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"B1","text":"「**searching**」は、何かを探している状態を表す言葉です。動詞としては、「I am **searching** for my keys.（鍵を探しています）」のように使います。形容詞としては、「She gave me a **searching** look.（彼女は私をじっと見つめた）」のように、相手をよく見ようとする様子を表します。名詞としては、「The police conducted a **searching** of the house.（警察は家を捜索した）」のように、捜索という行為そのものを指します。"},"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"She spent the morning **searching** for her lost earring.","translation":"彼女は午前中、なくしたイヤリングを探して過ごした。","type":"verb (present participle)","meaning_category":"探している"},{"sentence":"The detective gave the suspect a **searching** look.","translation":"刑事は容疑者に詮索好きな視線を送った。","type":"adjective","meaning_category":"探求的な"},{"sentence":"The **searching** of the luggage took a long time.","translation":"荷物の捜索には長い時間がかかった。","type":"noun","meaning_category":"捜索"}]}
